caption.text: Professional Instruments Used to Calibrate the Simplified Sensing Module Outputs

statement.text: The professional unit used for Adafruit TSL2591 is ASEQ LR1-T v.2.

It is also more accurate than other cadmium sulfide cells and enables exact lux calculations both in infrared and full-spectrum diodes [12] .
